amendment.description: An amendment numbered 96 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to develop, finalize, issue, or use assessments under Environmental Protection Agency's Integrated Risk Information System (IRIS).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
